summary: Replaces the vanilla loincloth with the vanilla speedo underwear.
descriptionHtml:
[center][url=http://www.facebook.com/IceburgModding][img]http://static2.nexusmods.com/110/mods/110/images/15827-1-1349192119.png[/img][/url][/center]
Replaces the vanilla loincloth with the vanilla speedo underwear texture. This means that instead of looking at a large loincloth flap your character will sport a whity-tighty underwear piece. 
This mod should technically give you an infinitely small performance boost as the loincloth flap had 417 vertices while the new underwear piece has about 64 vertices. The new underwear uses the vanilla texture, and should work fine with texture replacers.

[Img]http://static1.nexusmods.com/110/mods/110/images/14880-3-1334088845.png [/img]


This mod was my introduction to porting armor from blender into Skyrim, and was inspired by the oblivion mod [url=http://tes.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=27182]Immersive Male Underwear Dark Brown Version- by Andros.[/url]

I made it as a stepping stone to my [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16020]Iceburg's Spiderman Suit mod.[/url]

If you like this mod, be sure to check out my other mods by clicking [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=1398716]here[/url] and clicking on the files tab. :D

Thank you!
[img]http://z13.invisionfree.com/IceburgsSkyrim/index.php?act=Attach&type=post&id=22002745[/img]

Merge the 'Data' folder with the 'Data' folder in your Skyrim folder.  

[img]http://z13.invisionfree.com/IceburgsSkyrim/index.php?act=Attach&type=post&id=22002750[/img]

Uninstall: Datameshesactorscharactercharacter assets malebody_0 and malebody_1

[img]http://z13.invisionfree.com/IceburgsSkyrim/index.php?act=Attach&type=post&id=22002741[/img]
This includes a mesh, and uses vanilla textures. Therefore, it is incompatible with mods that change the default body. (Obviously).
However, it IS compatible with mods that change body textures, as the new textures should work fine with this body mesh.

[img]http://z13.invisionfree.com/IceburgsSkyrim/index.php?act=Attach&type=post&id=22002740[/img]

None at this point.

[img]http://z13.invisionfree.com/IceburgsSkyrim/index.php?act=Attach&type=post&id=22002748[/img]

I am currently not posting any mods on Steam Workshop. If you see one of my mods on Steam Workshop, please report the file to me. 
Thank :D
author: Iceburg
